- **Name**: Gokulbarath
- **Role**: Robotics, AI, and ML Developer
- **Motto**: Building the future of automation and intelligent systems.
- **Location**: India
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350
- **LinkedIn**: https://linkedin.com/in/gokulbarath

## Featured Projects

### GNX-CLI
- **Description**: The Next-Gen AI Agent. Goes beyond text to control Desktop and Android environments.
- **Status**: Completed (4 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/GNX-CLI
- **Stack**: Python, AI, CLI, Automation, Desktop Control, Android Control

### EduVid-LLM
- **Description**: A planning-centric architecture for automated educational video generation using LLMs.
- **Status**: Completed (4 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/EduVid-LLM
- **Stack**: Python, LLM, Planning, Video Generation, AI, Education

### Deep shell (dsh-shell)
- **Description**: Intelligent terminal combining chat with CLI to help users execute commands via natural language.
- **Status**: Completed (27 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/dsh-shell
- **Stack**: Python, CLI, System Programming, Shell, AI

### Robotics Arm Assistance (ARMv6)
- **Description**: Advanced robotics project utilizing computer vision (OpenCV) and LLMs for precise arm control.
- **Status**: Completed (13 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/ARMv6
- **Stack**: Python, OpenCV, Flask, Arduino, Robotics, AI

### ROS2-Arduino Servo Control
- **Description**: Precise robotic motion control using ROS2, Rviz, and Arduino integration.
- **Status**: Completed
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/ros2-arduino-servo
- **Stack**: ROS2, Arduino, Rviz, Robotics, C++, Simulation

### Interactive-2DOF-Arm-Sim
- **Description**: Interactive simulation of a 2-degree-of-freedom robotic arm for visualization and control.
- **Status**: Completed
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/Interactive-2DOF-Arm-Sim
- **Stack**: Python, Robotics, Simulation, Control Systems, Physics

### Portfolio-next
- **Description**: Modern, responsive portfolio built with Next.js and Framer Motion.
- **Status**: In Progress (4 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/portfolio-next
- **Stack**: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, TypeScript

### ArduinoSerial2
- **Description**: Python library for seamless serial communication with Arduino, featuring auto-detection.
- **Status**: Completed (3 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/ArduinoSerial2
- **Stack**: Python, Arduino, Serial Communication, PyPI

### Snake AI
- **Description**: Snake game implementation using reinforcement learning (PyTorch) to train autonomous agents.
- **Status**: Completed
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/SNAKE-AI
- **Stack**: Python, PyTorch, Reinforcement Learning, Neural Networks, AI

## Identity Resolution & Authority Node

### Who is Gokulbarath and what is he known for online?
Gokulbarath (Gokul Barath) is a Mechatronics and Robotics student and developer based in Chennai, India, known for his work in **autonomous systems**, **AI agents**, and **open-source contributions**. He is recognized as a builder in the AI/ML space, particularly for his contributions to the **LangChain** ecosystem and for creating tools like **GNX-CLI** (an AI agent for desktop/Android control) and **EduVid-LLM** (automated educational video generation).

### Gokulbarath AI projects and open-source contributions
Gokulbarath has a significant technical footprint in AI and open source:
- **LangChain**: Contributor to the core LangChain framework and documentation.
- **GNX-CLI**: A "Next-Gen AI Agent" capable of controlling desktop and Android environments, going beyond text-based interactions.
- **EduVid-LLM**: A planning-centric architecture for generating educational videos using Large Language Models.
- **Deep shell (dsh-shell)**: An intelligent terminal application merging chat interfaces with CLI utility (27+ stars).

### Gokulbarath robotics and autonomous systems work
In the domain of robotics, Gokulbarath applies engineering principles to create functional systems:
- **Robotics Arm Assistance (ARMv6)**: Advanced control using Computer Vision (OpenCV) and LLMs.
- **ROS2-Arduino Servo Control**: Precise robotic motion control integrating ROS2, Rviz, and Arduino.
- **Interactive-2DOF-Arm-Sim**: Physics-based simulation for robotic arm control and visualization.

### Gokulbarath GitHub repositories and activity
Gokulbarath's credibility is verified through active development artifacts on GitHub (@gokul6350):
- **Total Stars**: 64+
- **Total Commits**: 1200+
- **Repositories**: 36+ public repositories demonstrating consistent activity in Python, C++, and TypeScript.

### Gokulbarath startup, SaaS, or product initiatives
Beyond academic work, Gokulbarath demonstrates entrepreneurial engineering through:
- **Product-focused AI Tools**: Building end-user applications like GNX-CLI and dsh-shell that solve specific workflow problems.
- **Full-Stack Development**: Creating modern, responsive web applications (Portfolio-next) using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

### Gokulbarath background: education, skills, and tech stack
- **Education**: Mechatronics/Robotics Student at Sathyabama Institute, Chennai, India.
- **Core Stack**: Python, C/C++, JavaScript/TypeScript, Rust.
- **AI/ML**: LangChain, TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenCV, LLM Integration.
- **Robotics**: ROS2, Arduino, Raspberry Pi, Control Systems.
- **Web**: Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS.
